html:
1 February 2022 09:52 p.m. All figures in US dollars.

Amazon.com Inc is expected to show a decrease in its fourth quarter earnings to $3.67​ per share according to the mean Refinitiv estimate from forty one analysts. Wall Street expects results to range from 97 cents to ​$7.04 per share.

RECOMMENDATIONS

* The consensus recommendation for the company is "Buy". This includes twenty "Strong Buy", thirty four "Buy", one "Hold".

* The average consensus recommendation for the department stores peer group is also "Buy".

FORECAST CHANGES

* Forty three analysts are currently providing Refinitiv with estimates.

* In the last week four analysts have negatively revised earnings estimates and one analyst has revised an earnings estimate upward. There was a gain of one new estimates.

* In the last four weeks the earnings per share estimate has fallen by 2.11 percent from $3.75. Estimates ranged from a high of $7.04 to a low of 97 cents. There has been a gain of one new estimates.

* The StarMine predicted earnings surprise is too low to be considered statistically significant. Predicted revenue surprise is too low to be significant.

* The average price target from the forty three analysts providing estimates is $4,095.17.

YEAR OVER YEAR

* The company is expected to report a rise in revenue to $137.6 billion from $125.56 billion in the same quarter last year.

* The current quarter consensus estimate of $3.67 per share implies a loss of 73.93 percent from the same quarter last year when the company reported $14.09 per share.

* Previous quarterly performance (using preferred earnings measure)
